00010 // Check against redundant including
00011 #ifndef TT_LOWPASS_ONEPOLE_H
00012 #define TT_LOWPASS_ONEPOLE_H
00013 
00014 // Include appropriate headers
00015 #include "tt_audio_base.h"
00016 
00017 
00018 /********************************************************
00019         CLASS INTERFACE/IMPLEMENTATION
00020 
00021         The entire class is implemented inline for speed.
00022  ********************************************************/
00023 
00024 class tt_lowpass_onepole:public tt_audio_base{
00025 
00026         private:
00027                 // int  sr;                                                                     *** Inherited: Holds local sample rate
00028                 tt_attribute_value      coefficient;
00029                 tt_attribute_value      frequency;
00030                 double                          feedback;       
00031         
00032         
00033         public:
00034                 // void set_sr(int);                                            *** Inherited: Sets local sample rate
00035                 // int get_sr();                                                        *** Inherited: Retrieves local sample rate
00036                 // void set_global_sr(int);                                     *** Inherited: Sets global sample rate
00037                 // int get_global_sr();                                         *** Inherited: Retrieves global sample rate
00038 
00039                 enum selectors{                                                         // Attribute Selectors
00040                         k_coefficient,
00041                         k_frequency
00042                 };
00043                 
00044 
00045                 // OBJECT LIFE                                  
00046                 tt_lowpass_onepole()                    // Constructor          
00047                 {
00048                         set_attr(k_frequency, 5000.0);
00049                         clear();
00050                 }
00051 
00052                 ~tt_lowpass_onepole()                                                   // Destructor
00053                 {
00054                         ;
00055                 }
00056 
00057 
00058                 // ATTRIBUTES
00059                 void set_attr(tt_selector sel, tt_attribute_value val)  // Set Attributes
00060                 {
00061                         double radians;
00062 
00063                         switch (sel){                   
00064                                 case k_frequency:
00065                                         frequency = val;
00066                                         radians = hertz_to_radians(frequency);
00067                                         coefficient = clip(radians / pi, 0.0, 1.0);                     
00068                                         break;
00069                                 case k_coefficient:
00070                                         coefficient = val;
00071                                         break;
00072                         }
00073                 }
00074 
00075                 tt_attribute_value get_attr(tt_selector sel)                            // Get Attributes
00076                 {
00077                         switch (sel){
00078                                 case k_frequency:
00079                                         return frequency;
00080                                 case k_coefficient:
00081                                         return coefficient;
00082                                 default:
00083                                         return 0.0;
00084                         }
00085                 }
00086                 
00087                 
00088                 // DSP LOOP
00089                 void dsp_vector_calc(tt_audio_signal *in, tt_audio_signal *out)
00090                 {
00091                         temp_vs = in->vectorsize;
00092                         while(temp_vs--){
00093                                 *out->vector++ = feedback = anti_denormal((*in->vector++ * coefficient) + (feedback * (1 - coefficient)));
00094                         }
00095                         in->reset(); out->reset();
00096                 }
00097 
00098                 // ADDITIONAL METHODS *******************************************************
00099 
00100                 // clear
00101                 void clear()
00102                 {
00103                         feedback = 0.0; 
00104                 }
00105                 
00106                 // set sample-rate (override the inherited method)
00107                 void set_sr(int value)
00108                 {
00109                         sr = value;
00110                         r_sr = 1.0 / value;
00111                         m_sr = sr * 0.001;
00112                         
00113                         set_attr(k_frequency, frequency);
00114                 }               
00115 };
00116 
00117 
00118 #endif  // TT_LOWPASS_ONEPOLE_H
